mapper.sql: SELECT /* etEntrBase.etEntrBaseList */ ENTR_NO , ENTR_NM , ENTR_GB_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('VD001',ENTR_GB_CD) AS ENTR_GB_NM , TRD_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('VD003',TRD_STAT_CD) AS TRD_STAT_NM , LGC_ENTR_NO , RPSTMN_NM , BMAN_NO , BTYP , BKIND , CONT_STRT_DY , CONT_END_DY , AEMP_NM , AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO , AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_TEL_END_NO , AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO , AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_CELL_END_NO , BMAN_KIND_CD , ZIP_NO_SEQ , ZIP_NO , ZIP_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , RMK_CMT FROM ET_ENTR_BASE WHERE 1=1 AND ENTR_GB_CD LIKE #{entrGbCd} || '%' AND TRD_STAT_CD LIKE #{trdStatCd} || '%' AND ENTR_NO LIKE #{entrNo} || '%' AND ENTR_NM LIKE #{entrNm} || '%'
mapper.select: SELECT /* etEntrBase.getEtEntrBaseListCount */ COUNT(*) FROM ET_ENTR_BASE WHERE 1=1 AND ENTR_GB_CD LIKE #{entrGbCd} || '%' AND TRD_STAT_CD LIKE #{trdStatCd} || '%' AND ENTR_NO LIKE #{entrNo} || '%' AND ENTR_NM LIKE #{entrNm} || '%'
mapper.sql: SELECT /* etEntrBase.partnerList */ ENTR_NO , ENTR_NM , TRD_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('VD003',TRD_STAT_CD) AS TRD_STAT_NM , RPSTMN_NM , BMAN_NO , BTYP , BKIND , AEMP_NM , AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO , AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_TEL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_END_NO, '') END AS AEMP_TEL_NO , AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO , AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_CELL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_END_NO, '') END AS AEMP_CELL_NO , TRD_TYP_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('VD002',TRD_TYP_CD) AS TRD_TYP_NM , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ET_ENTR_BASE WHERE 1=1 AND ENTR_GB_CD = '10' AND ENTR_NO LIKE #{entrNo} || '%' AND ENTR_NM LIKE #{entrNm} || '%' AND TRD_STAT_CD LIKE #{trdStatCd} || '%' AND TRD_TYP_CD LIKE #{trdTypCd} || '%' ORDER BY ENTR_NO DESC
mapper.select: SELECT /* etEntrBase.getEtEntrBaseOne */ ENTR_NO , ENTR_NM , ENTR_GB_CD , TRD_TYP_CD , TRD_STAT_CD , LGC_ENTR_NO , RPSTMN_NM , BMAN_NO , CORPN_NO , BTYP , BKIND , CONT_STRT_DY , CONT_END_DY , AEMP_NM , AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO , AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_TEL_END_NO , AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO , AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_CELL_END_NO , FAX_RGN_NO , FAX_TXNO_NO , FAX_END_NO , BMAN_KIND_CD , ZIP_NO_SEQ , ZIP_NO , ZIP_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , RMK_CMT , SYS_REG_ID , SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ET_ENTR_BASE WHERE ENTR_NO = #{entrNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT /* etEntrBase.deliveryPolicyList */ EEB.ENTR_NO , EEB.ENTR_NM , EDPB.DELI_POLC_NO , EDPB.DLEX_TYP_CD , EDPB.STD_AMT , EDPB.DLEX_AMT , EDPB.FERRY_RGN_DLEX_AMT , EDPB.JEJU_DLEX , EDPB.JEJU_FERRY_RGN_DLEX_AMT , EDPB.RTN_AMT , EDPB.USE_YN , EDPB.SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(EDPB.SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , EDPB.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(EDPB.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ET_ENTR_BASE EEB , ET_DELI_POLC_BASE EDPB WHERE EDPB.ENTR_NO = EEB.ENTR_NO AND EEB.ENTR_GB_CD = '10' AND EEB.ENTR_NO LIKE #{entrNo} || '%' AND EEB.ENTR_NM LIKE #{entrNm} || '%' ORDER BY EEB.ENTR_NO DESC, EDPB.DLEX_TYP_CD ASC

SELECT /* etEntrBase.cooperateList */ ENTR_NO , ENTR_NM , TRD_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('VD003',TRD_STAT_CD) AS TRD_STAT_NM , RPSTMN_NM , BMAN_NO , BTYP , BKIND , AEMP_NM , AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO , AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_TEL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_END_NO, '') END AS AEMP_TEL_NO , AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO , AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_CELL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_END_NO, '') END AS AEMP_CELL_NO , TRD_TYP_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('VD002',TRD_TYP_CD) AS TRD_TYP_NM , CONT_STRT_DY , CONT_END_DY , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ET_ENTR_BASE WHERE 1=1 AND ENTR_GB_CD = '20' AND ENTR_NO LIKE #{condxEntrNo} || '%' AND ENTR_NM LIKE #{condxEntrNm} || '%' AND TRD_STAT_CD LIKE #{condxTrdStatCd} || '%' ORDER BY ENTR_NO DESC
mapper.select: SELECT /* etEntrBase.getCooperateDetail */ ENTR_NO , ENTR_NM , ENTR_GB_CD , TRD_TYP_CD , TRD_STAT_CD , LGC_ENTR_NO , RPSTMN_NM , BMAN_NO , CORPN_NO , BTYP , BKIND , CONT_STRT_DY , CONT_END_DY , AEMP_NM , AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO , AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_TEL_END_NO , AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO , AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_CELL_END_NO , FAX_RGN_NO , FAX_TXNO_NO , FAX_END_NO , BMAN_KIND_CD , ZIP_NO_SEQ , ZIP_NO , ZIP_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , RMK_CMT FROM ET_ENTR_BASE WHERE ENTR_NO = #{entrNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT /* etEntrBase.cooperateChannelList */ ENTR_NO , ENTR_NM , TRD_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('VD003',TRD_STAT_CD) AS TRD_STAT_NM , RPSTMN_NM , BMAN_NO , BTYP , BKIND , AEMP_NM , AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO , AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_TEL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_END_NO, '') END AS AEMP_TEL_NO , AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO , AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_CELL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO,'') || '-' || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || '-' || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_END_NO, '') END AS AEMP_CELL_NO , TRD_TYP_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('VD002',TRD_TYP_CD) AS TRD_TYP_NM , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ET_ENTR_BASE WHERE 1=1 AND ENTR_GB_CD = '20' AND ENTR_NO LIKE #{condxEntrNo} || '%' AND ENTR_NM LIKE #{condxEntrNm} || '%' ORDER BY ENTR_NO DESC
